section.p: 'Welcome, mighty adventurer,' says an old, black-toothed peasant. 'Ye goin' to try your hand against Grindel the Ripper?'
You ask if anyone has seen Grindel, and how many people he has carried away.
'Oh, he be huge, and covered in scales, strong as strong can be, toothed and fearsome, like a two-legged dragon!' says one.
'Aye, and he carried off ... who was it now?' says another.

'Well, there was, hmm, can't remember any locals been taken recently. Mind you, there was Faldered the Fearsome, that mercenary. We found his head on the road. And Obraid the Capable, a mage from Dweomer - we found his body-parts scattered all over the stableyard! "Obraid the Incapable" we put on his tombstone!'
